page.description: Add biometric authentication to your iOS applications using the Fingerprint Touch ID plugin.

discussion.p: The Fingerprint Touch ID plugin can be used to add biometric authentication to your application. In addition to (or in lieu of) entering a password, the user's identification can be verified using their fingerprint or face on an iOS device.
On devices that do no support Touch ID or Face ID, the user is prompted to enter their passcode instead.
There are several UX Templates available that demonstrate how to integrate Touch ID/Face ID recognition into your iOS applications:
